EmailTemplate.description: template to supply CFA usernames to Renault users
EmailTemplate.name: iCRM CFA Credentials
EmailTemplate.subject: iCRM CFA Credentials - case #{!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Please find enclosed your access credentials and the web address for iCRM.
A full User Guide can be found in the Reports Dashboard. For future reference it is recommended to save this document to your hard drive.
When you first log-in you will be presented with a security screen to assist with the retrieval of your passwords if forgotten in the future. Please select and answer your three preferred questions using the drop down tab.
Credentials are E-mail sensitive, so please do not share the password with a third party. If further credentials are required i.e. outsourced/internal call centres, then please contact the Helpdesk as per instructions below.
User Name:
iCRM URL: https://polkconnect3.polk.com
Please note, for security reasons your password will follow within the next hour.
If you require any further information, please do not hesitate to contact the IHS Markit Automotive Global Product Helpdesk on 01727-733800 - or Email at automotive_support@ihsmarkit.com
